subject: Playoff Games
Baseball
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: After the Yankees lost to Detroit in Game 4 of the A.L.C.S. to complete a harsh postseason exit, General Manager Brian Cashman’s message was, Don’t blame Kevin Long, the team’s hitting instructor.
snippet: After the Yankees lost to Detroit in Game 4 of the A.L.C.S. to complete a harsh postseason exit, General Manager Brian Cashman’s message was, Don’t blame Kevin Long, the team’s hitting instructor.
